comment: The NPC is immunized to all dangers. You may call them brainwashed, blind to the truth, downright stupid. It all runs off them like water does a raincoat. But call them an NPC and watch how they shrivel, step back, and say, "I've been found out."
amr:
# ::snt The NPC is immunized to all dangers. You may call them brainwashed, blind to the truth, downright stupid. It all runs off them like water does a raincoat. But call them an NPC and watch how they shrivel, step back, and say, "I've been found out."
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / immunize-01
            :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "NPC"))
            :ARG2 (d / danger
                  :mod (a / all)))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (c / call-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / they)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (b / brainwash-01
                              :ARG1 t)
                        :op2 (b2 / blind-02
                              :ARG1 t
                              :ARG2 (t2 / truth))
                        :op3 (s / stupid
                              :degree (d2 / downright)))))
      :snt3 (r / run-off-24
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it
                  :mod (a3 / all))
            :ARG2 t
            :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                  :ARG2 (r3 / run-16
                        :ARG0 (w / water)
                        :ARG2 (r4 / raincoat))))
      :snt4 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (c3 / call-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 t
                        :ARG2 (n2 / NPC))
                  :op2 (w2 / watch-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                              :manner-of (s2 / shrivel-01
                                    :ARG1 t)))
                  :op3 (s3 / step-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG2 (b3 / back))
                  :op4 (s4 / say-01
                        :mode imperative
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (f / find-out-03
                              :ARG0 y)))))
